ovdesc.p: This application is used to design toolbars to be used in T24 Applications. The toolbars are defined as a number of tools which are defined by the BROWSER.TOOLS. Once designed the tools can be added to an application by use of the EB.ADD.TOOLBAR subroutine.

desc.p: The text to display as a toolbar title
This field is a text description that will be displayed with the toolbar.
This multi valued field is the list of tools to be on the toolbar. Each tool is specified as a key on the BROWSER.TOOLS application
Must be a valid key on the BROWSER.TOOLS application
A descriptive key for a record on the BROWSER.TOOLBAR application
Any characters up to 35 in length
